interpretation: The "hair pick" card represents the act of clearing away the old to reveal the new. It signifies a time of shedding old habits and beliefs, and embracing a fresh perspective. This may require some discomfort, like the tugging sensation of a hair pick through tangled hair, but ultimately leads to a clearer and more polished outcome. This card encourages you to take a step back and reevaluate your current situation. What is holding you back? What needs to be let go of in order to move forward? Embrace the act of decluttering and allow yourself to be open to new possibilities. Keywords associated with this card include: decluttering, shedding, clearing away, fresh start, discomfort, and new perspective.
